entry.title: jQuery转换树形结构
entry.content: /** * [convert 树形结构转换] * @param  {[object]} rows [对象] * @return {[object]} nodes [对象] */function convert(rows){    // 排除子节点    function exists(rows, pid){        for(var i=0; i<rows.length; i++){            if (rows[i].menu_id == pid) return true;        }        return false;    }    var nodes = [];    // get the top level nodes 根节点    for(var i=0; i<rows.length; i++){        var row = rows[i];        if (!exists(rows, row.pid)){            nodes.push({                menu_id:row.menu_id,                menu_name:row.menu_name,                pid:row.pid,                url:row.url,                menu_type:row.menu_type,                icon:row.icon,                target:row.target            });        }    }    var toDo = [];    // var toDo = nodes；toDo和nodes里面存的同一个对象：关联！    for(var i=0; i<nodes.length; i++){        toDo.push(nodes[i]);    }    while(toDo.length){        var node = toDo.shift();    // the parent node  关联！        // get the list nodes        for(var i=0; i<rows.length; i++){            var row = rows[i];            if (row.pid == node.menu_id){                var child = {menu_id:row.menu_id,menu_name:row.menu_name,pid:row.pid,url:row.url,menu_type:row.menu_type,icon:row.icon,target:row.target};                if (node.list){                    node.list.push(child);                } else {                    node.list = [child];                }                toDo.push(child);            }        }    }    return nodes;}
entry.summary: <pre><code>/** * [convert 树形结构转换] * @param {[object]} rows [对象] * @return {[object]} nodes [对象] */ function convert(rows){ // 排除子节点
